title: Duke
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN B086XLYYPX~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Duke Hard ~ ~ ~ ~ ~I’m a dark fallen angel.It’s my life.It’s about the MC.It’s about my brothers.My pledge.My honor and respect.I’m with family.I’m not looking for love.I’m unworthy.My only love disappeared.My heart is cold.My soul is dead.I’ve moved on.~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Nicole Duncan ~ ~ ~ ~ ~I’m scared.My baby is in danger.He needs his father.I don’t know where he is.I need help.I need to ask my brother.They were best friends.I need to find him.My baby needs him.
author: P.T. Macias
